review: Very nice device if you ever figure out how to install kodi on it like i did. I never have to pay for cable again thanks to this. Its cheaper and more reliable than those Android TV boxes because its a Amazon device for christ sakes (Amazon customer service is second to none in my book). It shipped in perfect condition and arrived exactly when they said it would. Its a simple device that works as its intended.

review: I am really enjoying the Fire TV Stick. With the combination of Amazon Prime, Hulu, and Netflix I was able to cancel my satellite programming.
